p: Mice liver was wisely handled after slaughtering and saved in formalin (10%) to protect it from oxidation or damage. Tested specimens were dehydrated in alcohol then passed into different xylene changes and fix into paraffin section. For histopathological investigations, specimen was cut by microtome with 5 µm thickness, mounted at glass slides and after that stained through Ehrlich’s hematoxylin as well as eosin counter stain.
